verses.translation: When the earth is shaken with a mighty quake,
and the earth throws out its burdens[1],
and man says[2], “What is the matter with it?”
On that Day it will recount all its news,
because your Lord has inspired it [to do so].

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
verses.translation: On that Day all people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds[3].

verses.arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: So whoever does an atom’s weight[4] of good will see it,

verses.arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
